page.title: 14TRANSPORT AND TRAVEL (2)
page.content:
In and around Thorner, along the 'B' roads, traffic was very light with less than 100 vehicles per hour passing along Main Street. The vast majority of vehicles were private motor cars.
The A64 York Road links Leeds with the A1 road. Traffic was heavy with well over 1000 vehicles per hour, increasing at peak times. The majority of vehicles were private cars and lorries. It is also a main bus route.
On the A64 and the surrounding minor roads there were several farm vehicles moving between fields and farms, as may be expected in an area used predominantly for farming.
